div.l: As many yere as hit Is passed henne
Syn that my tappe of lif by gan to renne
For sikerlik whan ik was born a non
Deth drough the tappe of lyf and leet it gon
And eủere sith hath so the tappe y ronne
Til al most al empti is the tonne
The streme of lyf now droppeth on the chembe
The sely tonge may wel rynge and chymbe
Of wrecched nesse that passed is ful yoore
Whan that oure hoost hadde herdde this sermonyng
He gan to speke as lordly as a kyng
And seide what a montheth al this wit
Whi shal we speken alday of holy writ
The deuel made a Reue for to preche
Or of a souter a Shipman or a leche
Say forth thi tale and tary noght the tyme
Lo depford and it is half way pryme
Lo Grenewich ther many a srewe is Inne
Hit were al tyme thi tale to be gynne
Now sires quod this Oswold the Reue
Y pray you alle that ye noght you greue
Though I answere and somdel sette is howe
For leueful is with force Force of showe
This dronken myller hath I told vs heer
How that bigeled was a Carpenter
ꝐParauenture in scorne for I am on
And by youre leue y shal hym quyte a noon
Right in his cherles termes wol y speke
I pray to god his nekke mot to breke
He kan wel in myne eye seen a stalke
But in his owene he kan nat seen a balke
